sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react" import AddHikeForm from "./AddHikeForm" export default function HikeCard({props}) { const {hikeName, distance, state, elevationGain, difficulty, notes, _id, hike} = props const [editHikingToggle, setEditHikingToggle] =useState(false) return( <>
{/*

Name: {hikeName}

Distance: {hike.distance}

State: {hike.state}

Zipcode: {hike.zipcode}

Elevation Gain: {hike.elevationGain}

Difficulty: {hike.difficulty}

Notes: {hike.notes}

*/}
{/* inside HikeCard conditionally renderform here */}
<> { !editHikingToggle ? <> : <> } ) }
